page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN THE{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE AREA ARE{EMPLOYED.}HARDLY ANY PEOPLE WORK IN THE{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE}AREA: INSTEAD{ONE HALF}OF THE{WORKING POPULATION WORK IN{CUPAR}AND{DUNDEE AND{ONE EIGHTH}OF THEM WORK IN{LEVEN AND{St.ANDREWS.}THE JOBS PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED AT ARE AS FOLLOWS:{ONE EIGHTH OF THE POPULATION WORK ON{FARMS,}ARE {NURSING ASSISTANTS,}WORK WITH {HANDICAPPED PEOPLE,}ARE{ENGINEERS}OR ARE{TEACHERS}AND{ONE QUARTER}OF THE POPULATION ARE{SHOP ASSISTANTS.}THERE ARE NOT AS MANY PEOPLE EMPLOYED ON FARMS NOW BECAUSE OF{FARM {MECHANISATION.
